issue.title: [R] Add support for datasets with IPC files and with multiple sources
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7578](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7578). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7578?focusedCommentId=17015346) by Tyler Brown (tbonz):*
for SQL dump file parsing, may want to reference: <https://github.com/hyrise/sql-parser>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7578?focusedCommentId=17015359) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Thanks for the heads up. That's not what this issue is about, but we'll keep it in mind.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7578?focusedCommentId=17016455) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6205
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6205>
